casebody.data:
ELDRIDGE, Alias GLADDEN v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND HOUSE OF CORRECTION [H. C. No. 20,

September Term, 1958.]

Decided November 13, 1958.

Before Bruñe, C. J., and Henderson, Hammond, Prescott and Horney, JJ.

PER Curiam.

This application for leave to appeal from a refusal to grant *649a writ of habeas corpus is denied for the reasons set out in the opinion of Judge Rollins below.

Application denied, with costs.
